programme.title: ELSBETH SEASON 2
programme.desc: When a finance executive is found stabbed to death after a night at the opera, Elsbeth suspects an obsessed opera lover Nathan Lane was driven to murder because of a ringing cell phone.

programme.desc: When the evidence room is broken into and significant cash goes missing, the team looks into a connection to a recent case. Also, Lala opens up to Gibbs, and Kowalski struggles to move forward.

programme.title: BAD BOYS FOR LIFE

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the worlds biggest streamer.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing
programme.desc: Liquid Death was founded on the idea of breaking the norms of traditional marketing. We speak to CMO Dan Murphy about the water companys origin as a sheep in wolfs clothing.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing
programme.desc: We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of NeuroInsight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.

programme.title: Bloomberg Screentime Defining the Next Phase of Pop Culture
programme.desc: Screentime gathers the moguls, celebrities, and entrepreneurs defining the next phase of pop culture, including Michael Rapino, Clara Wu Tsai, Brian Roberts, Bela Bajaria and Snoop Dogg.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But Chinas dominance of the supply chain for rareearth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputingwhere scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africas biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africas quest of bridging the gap with global powers.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The three Baby Bears try to get adopted at a pet shop and find a new home.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Shag hires a bunch of detectives to find his lost sense of childhood wonder.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robins wish comes true and he finally gets superpowers but at what cost?

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: After a headon collision cracks Buster Dran, Khrome reflects on his time with Jaxon.

programme.title: Unikitty
programme.desc: Unikitty and the gang tell spooky, scary and silly stories during their Halloween party.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: Amato and Pian plan to go into the Mechanizer to see the new town the Cone Konchos have built, but things go wrong when Bula and Bili accidentally join them.

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is asked to wear a sheep costume to help advertise Irmas knitwear stall, but he gets stuck in it!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: When Clarence realizes the classroom buddy star system is leaving some kids behind, he creates his own form of currency called Clarence Dollars. The new reward system promptly turns the entire school upside down.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: After being shrunk by a capsule toy machine robot, Amato, MechaBot and Deep have to find a way to return to their original sizes.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: While searching for plastic bottles for their class project, Amato and friends meet a recycling robot made from plastic.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Justice League holds a talent competition to find a superhero worthy of joining the team.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Tweety Bird is going to the Grand Canyon, and Sylvester is going after Tweety. Elmer Fudd wants to play golf, too bad Daffy wants to be his caddy.

programme.title: Steven Universe The Movie
programme.desc: After so many harrowing adventures, Steven and the Gems are ready to celebrate how far theyve come with a movie musical! Little do they know theyre about to face their worst enemy yet.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird learns a lesson when he takes one of Buffs stuffed animals without asking. When the stuffed animal accidentally gets swiped by the Legion of Zoom, Redbird will have to rescue the stuffed unicorn or admit to Buff what he did.

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When their young neighbour CeCe comes over to visit, Drew and Jonathan share the story of how the Dream Factory came to be.

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: The Power Rockers perform on Concert Day, but notice their parents are seeing them through their phone screens.

programme.title: Baby Looney Tunes
programme.desc: The Baby Looney Tunes pitch in to make an Arbor Day gift for Granny, while Baby Lola, who suggested that they do so, tries to make Granny a present on her own. Lola ends up saving a living tree all by herself, doing the planet a world of good.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: MacBarm is bringing his chickens a new trough full of feed, that is until it falls out of his truck and breaks. Grandma and her twin sister return to Treetop Woods to recreate their old zipline act.

programme.title: Jessicas Big Little World
programme.desc: Jessica goes in the big kid part of the playground for the first time, and befriends Stanleigh.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Its night in the middle of the day. And very cold. In fact, Bao & Bao are freezing! Our friends must get to the bottom of this strange phenomenon, ASAP!

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar The Lizard sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: No Ordinary Rescue S2
programme.desc: Why are more mammals stranding on the coast of Taiwan? While in China, thousands of migratory birds fall prey to hunters and illegal trade. These ordinary people are coming together to fight back.

Beyond The Headlines The Series
programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black womens disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: The First 48 S24
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a young mother is gunned down at a convenience store by a shotguntoting assailant. In Kansas City, a local businessman is executed and Detective Jason Sutton looks to his employees for a motive.

programme.title: After The First 48 S14
programme.desc: Gwinnett County Homicide investigates a parking lot brawl that leaves two young men shot dead, and could cost four others their lives in prison though three of them never fired a shot.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week Ghanian students plan the 77 Percent show on sustainable cities. We head to Accra to meet residents frustrated by the citys sanitation. We experience how traffic jams hinder progress for schoolchildren, and debate how better urban planning can shape Ghanas growing cities. In Uganda, we ride an ecofriendly bus, and finally, we meet Accras Buzstopboys, who keep the streets tidy.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: Twotime Dakar winner Timo Gottschalk tells us what makes a rally codriver tick. Inflation is making Pakistani motorists swap gas for electric. And REV tests the new Dacia Bigster. Will it disrupt the SUVC segment?

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Rita Lamptey is hoping to be one of the first of her siblings to finish her education a rarity for young women in her fishing community in Ghana. Basketball helps her stay focused on the classroom and has inspired her to lend a helping hand to the other young women in her community.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: This week Ghanian students plan the 77 Percent show on sustainable cities. We head to Accra to meet residents frustrated by the citys sanitation. programme.title: Arts Unveiled
programme.desc: Which is currently a greater threat to the world of books Being banned, or being replaced by AI? Arts Unveiled looks into the challenges faced by authors and illustrators, amongst others. Also a visit to a pixel forest made up of 3,000 LED lights.

programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Floridas Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Into The Puma Triangle
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, a Montana native wildlife expert works with wildlife filmmaker Ren Araneda to capture the wild pumas of Torres del Paine National Park in Chilean Patagonia. Together, they have filmed things seen nowhere else in the world that will unlock the mystery of the pumas true nature.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1
programme.desc: Every year in the dry season, as the floodwaters disappear, the grasslands of the Pantanal are home to many species giant anteaters, maned wolves and the greater rheas the largest bird in South America.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1
programme.desc: Join biologists on a hike through a giant otter refuge in the southern Pantanal. Will they find these shy, elusive animals or just the evidence of their daytoday lives? On the trail, check in on amorous tapirs and waterloving Muscovy ducks.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1
programme.desc: The Pantanal experiences extreme climatic shifts, from brutal droughts during the searingly hot dry season to floods created by rainyseason tempests. See how the regions diverse animal population works to coexist and ensure collective survival.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1
programme.desc: Get ready to understand the science behind Hawaiis stunning beaches. Why does sand appear white, yellow, black, green and red? How do active volcanoes change the coastline? Are other forces at play in shaping these incredible beaches?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Pups must save Humdinger and his kittens when they mess around with Toodles the Clowns tiny clown car.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pigs garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef is so focused on his avocados perfect ripeness that he ignores the rest of his avocado sushi recipe. Chefs friend inspires him to bring Hawaii home by making poi and decorating the Stumpstaycation style.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick gets a stunt double. Patricks organs leave his body in protest.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Leni must protect her mannequin friend Tanya when her boss, Ms. Carmichael, decides to update Reiningers. When Dante buries a secret in The Royal Woods Cemetery, he must stop the Morticians Club from discovering what it is.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After agreeing to go to The Royal Woods House of Terror, Linc and Clyde have to toughen up and face their fears.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, its up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Now that Freds leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harms way...no matter what! Patricks lemonade stand isnt doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

Who is the one behind them all?
